name: EasyPost
description: Offers a comprehensive shipping API that integrates with multiple carriers, providing label generation, tracking, and address verification.

name: Shippo
description: Provides a multi-carrier shipping API with features like rate comparison, label creation, and tracking for e-commerce businesses.

name: Easyship
description: Connects sellers and marketplaces to couriers, offering shipping rate calculations, label generation, and tracking services.

name: AfterShip
description: Specializes in shipment tracking and notifications, integrating with various carriers to provide real-time updates.

name: Freightos
description: Offers a digital freight platform for comparing and booking international freight services, including air, ocean, and trucking.

name: ClickPost
description: Provides a multi-carrier shipping API integrated with over 500 carrier partners, facilitating efficient logistics operations.

name: ShipStation
description: A web-based shipping solution that integrates with various carriers and e-commerce platforms, offering rate comparison and label printing.

name: ShippyPro
description: Offers a shipping API that connects with multiple carriers, providing rate calculation, label generation, and tracking services.

name: SendCloud
description: A shipping platform that connects e-commerce businesses with multiple carriers, offering rate comparison and label generation.

name: ShipHawk
description: Provides a shipping API that automates rate shopping, label creation, and tracking for various carriers.

name: ShipWorks
description: Offers shipping software that integrates with multiple carriers, providing rate comparison, label printing, and tracking.

name: ShipRush
description: Provides shipping solutions that integrate with various carriers, offering rate shopping, label printing, and tracking.

name: Ordoro
description: An e-commerce logistics platform that offers shipping rate comparison, label generation, and tracking across multiple carriers.

name: MetaPack
description: Provides a delivery management platform that connects retailers with carriers, offering rate calculation and tracking services.

name: Parcelhub
description: Offers multi-carrier shipping and tracking solutions, providing rate comparison and label generation.

name: Shiptheory
description: Provides shipping automation software that integrates with various carriers, offering rate calculation and label printing.

name: Shipwire
description: A fulfillment service that offers shipping rate calculation, label generation, and tracking through multiple carriers.

name: Stamps.com
description: Provides online postage and shipping software, offering rate calculation and label printing for various carriers.

name: Endicia
description: Offers shipping solutions with rate calculation, label printing, and tracking, primarily for USPS services.

name: Pitney Bowes
description: Provides shipping APIs that offer rate calculation, label generation, and tracking across multiple carriers.

name: XPS Ship
description: Offers a shipping platform with rate comparison, label printing, and tracking for various carriers.

name: Freightify
description: Offers a shipping API that connects ocean carrier rates and schedules directly to your software, providing real-time access to freight rates.

name: Searates
description: Provides a Ship Schedule API that aggregates shipping schedule data from different carriers, simplifying access to schedules.
